links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..700
formula: a(n) = n*C(3+n, 3). - _Zerinvary Lajos_, Jan 10 2006G.f.: 4*x/(1-x)^5. - _Colin Barker_, Mar 01 2012G.f.: 2*x/(1-x)*W(0), where W(k) = 1 + 1/( 1 - x*(k+2)*(k+4)/(x*(k+2)*(k+4) + (k+1)*(k+2)/W(k+1) )) ); (continued fraction). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Aug 24 2013
mathematica: f[n_]:=n*(n+1)*(n+2)*(n+3)/6; lst={};Do[AppendTo[lst,f[n]],{n,0,5!}];lst (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Jul 21 2009 *)# Binomial[#+3,3]&/@ Range[0,40]  (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Feb 20 2011 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
